H3.text: Rapunzel, Mother Gothel and Paulo are all characters in which 2010 animated film. Tangled

A4.text: Rapunzel, Flynn, Maximus, and Mother Gothel are all playable heroes in Disney Heroes: Battle Mode.

A5.text: Tangled tells the story of Rapunzel, a young princess with magical long blonde hair who tries to leave her secret tower.
